Desc.eng: I’m going to prepare a magical concoction, but I need some rare swamp lilies for the brew. Would you be so kind as to bring me eight flowers?
Not my usual line of work… but it sounds important.
You want me to pick flowers, like a peasant girl? No way.
This feels like the most challenging task of my life. But yes, I’m going to go out.. and gather some flowers.
Well, well, if it isn’t the most handsome hunter in Borgova!
Oooh, she’s planning something. Mark my words.
